adHeader: Want to lose weight but have anxiety about the gym?
adDetails: If you want to lose the weight, but hate going to the gym, I can help! If you want to lose the weight, but have anxiety towards crowded gym, I can help! If you want to lose the weight, but have anxiety towards personal trainers, I can help! If you want to lose the weight, but have anxiety going out, I can help! Or, if you want someone to just be there with you and help you lose the weight, I can totally help you! I used to be an obese person with social anxiety, so I know what you're going through. After my weight loss, I became a personal trainer to help other people like me. If you want more information, you can check out my website @ http://www.joepft.com/about-me.html Thanks for taking the time to check this listing. J. Abadilla
